verses.plain: Strive not with a mighty man’ lest thou fall into his hands.

tokens.t: Strive not with a mighty man’ lest thou fall into his hands.

verses.plain: Be not at variance with a rich man, lest he overweigh thee: for gold hath destroyed many, and perverted the hearts of kings.

tokens.t: Be not at variance with a rich man, lest he overweigh thee: for gold hath destroyed many, and perverted the hearts of kings.

verses.plain: Strive not with a man that is full of tongue, and heap not wood upon his fire.

tokens.t: Strive not with a man that is full of tongue, and heap not wood upon his fire.

verses.plain: Jest not with a rude man, lest thy ancestors be disgraced.

tokens.t: Jest not with a rude man, lest thy ancestors be disgraced.

verses.plain: Reproach not a man that turneth from sin, but remember that we are all worthy of punishment.

tokens.t: Reproach not a man that turneth from sin, but remember that we are all worthy of punishment.

verses.plain: Dishonour not a man in his old age: for even some of us wax old.

tokens.t: Dishonour not a man in his old age: for even some of us wax old.

verses.plain: Rejoice not over thy greatest enemy being dead, but remember that we die all.

tokens.t: Rejoice not over thy greatest enemy being dead, but remember that we die all.

verses.plain: Despise not the discourse of the wise, but acquaint thyself with their proverbs: for of them thou shalt learn instruction, and how to serve great men with ease.

tokens.t: Despise not the discourse of the wise, but acquaint thyself with their proverbs: for of them thou shalt learn instruction, and how to serve great men with ease.

verses.plain: Miss not the discourse of the elders: for they also learned of their fathers, and of them thou shalt learn understanding, and to give answer as need requireth.

tokens.t: Miss not the discourse of the elders: for they also learned of their fathers, and of them thou shalt learn understanding, and to give answer as need requireth.

verses.plain: Kindle not the coals of a sinner, lest thou be burnt with the flame of his fire.

tokens.t: Kindle not the coals of a sinner, lest thou be burnt with the flame of his fire.

verses.plain: Rise not up in anger at the presence of an injurious person, lest he lie in wait to entrap thee in thy words

tokens.t: Rise not up
at the presence of an injurious person, lest he lie in wait to entrap thee in thy words

verses.plain: Lend not unto him that is mightier than thyself; for if thou lendest him, count it but lost.

tokens.t: Lend not unto him that is mightier than thyself; for if thou lendest him, count it but lost.

verses.plain: Be not surety above thy power: for if thou be surety, take care to pay it.

tokens.t: Be not surety above thy power: for if thou be surety, take care to pay it.

verses.plain: Go not to law with a judge; for they will judge for him according to his honour.

tokens.t: Go not to law with a judge; for they will judge for him according to his honour.

verses.plain: Travel not by the way with a bold fellow, lest he become grievous unto thee: for he will do according to his own will, and thou shalt perish with him through his folly.

tokens.t: Travel not by the way with a bold fellow, lest he become grievous unto thee: for he will do according to his own will, and thou shalt perish with him through his folly.

verses.plain: Strive not with an angry man, and go not with him into a solitary place: for blood is as nothing in his sight, and where there is no help, he will overthrow thee.

tokens.t: Strive not with an angry man, and go not with him into a solitary place: for blood is as nothing in his sight, and where there is no help, he will overthrow thee.

verses.plain: Consult not with a fool; for he cannot keep counsel.

tokens.t: Consult not with a fool; for he cannot keep counsel.

verses.plain: Do no secret thing before a stranger; for thou knowest not what he will bring forth.

tokens.t: Do no secret thing before a stranger; for thou knowest not what he will bring forth.

verses.plain: Open not thine heart to every man, lest he requite thee with a shrewd turn.

tokens.t: Open not thine heart to every man, lest he requite thee with a shrewd turn.
